entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
